category: Click Boards > Audio & voice > Signal processing
name: mikroe.click.headphoneamp2
short_description: Headphone AMP 2 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a stereo headphone amplifier. This board features the MAX9723, a stereo DirectDrive headphone amplifier with BassMax, volume control, and I2C from Analog Devices. The amplifier delivers 62mW into a 16Ω load, and features a high 90dB PSRR at 1KHz and a low 0.006% THD+N. It also features an integrated 32-level volume control, click-and-pop suppression, ±8kV HBM ESD-protected headphone outputs, short-circuit and thermal-overload protection, and more.
